prompt.content: What is the percentage growth of VMI's R&D as a % of Product Sales from FY2023 to FY2024? Format answer as a % with two decimal places.

messages.content: [{"criteria":"Use R&D expense of 55,000 thousand for FY2023 as an input","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Use R&D expense of 59,000 thousand for FY2024 as an input"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Use Product Sales of 3,772,835 thousand for FY2023 as an input"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Use Product Sales of 3,660,779 thousand for FY2024 as an input"},{"criteria":"Calculate FY2023 R&D as % of Product Sales using the formula: 55,000/3,772,835 = 1.4578%","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Calculate FY2024 R&D as % of Product Sales using the formula: 59,000/3,660,779 = 1.6117%"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Compute percentage growth of the ratio using the formula: ((1.6117% - 1.4578%) / 1.4578%) Ã— 100 = 10.56%"}]
